article_title: Tulsa Woman Attacked, Robbed In Her Home - NewsOn6.com - Tulsa, OK - News, Weather, Video and Sports - KOTV.com
article_text:
Officers said the burglary and assault happened at a home in the 3400 block of East 5th Place just after 5 a.m.

Police say a man entered the home of an elderly woman, hit her on the head and stole her purse.

Officers said the assault happened at a home in the 3400 block of East 5th Place just after 5 a.m.

The 70-year-old victim told police the man took her purse containing her medication. The victim's granddaughter told police the woman had forgotten to lock the front door and believes that's how the man entered the home

EMSA says the victim was stable when paramedics took her to the hospital.

Police said the victim and the granddaughter could only give them a vague description of the man.
